mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM message WHERE receiver=#{receiver} AND del=0 AND state = 0 AND message_num=1

SELECT * FROM(SELECT num, message_num, sender, receiver, subject, content, state, sentDate, receiveDate, del, readCnt, rownum rNum FROM (SELECT * FROM message WHERE receiver = #{receiver} AND del = 0 AND message_num = 1 AND state = 0 ORDER BY message_num ASC)) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Message (num, message_num, sender, receiver, subject, content, state, sentDate, receiveDate, del, readCnt) VALUES(seq_message.nextval, #{message_num}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{state}, #{sentDate}, #{receiveDate}, #{readCnt}, #{del})

INSERT INTO Message (num, message_num, sender, receiver, subject, content, state, sentDate, receiveDate, del, readCnt) VALUES(seq_message.nextval, #{message_num}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{state}, #{sentDate}, #{receiveDate}, #{del}, #{readCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM message WHERE sender=#{sendId} AND del=0 AND message_num=2 AND state = 0

SELECT * FROM(SELECT num, message_num, sender, receiver, subject, content, state, sentDate, receiveDate, del ,rownum rNum FROM (SELECT * FROM message WHERE sender = #{sendId} AND del = 0 AND message_num = 2 AND state = 0 ORDER BY message_num ASC)) WHERE rNum >= #{start} AND rNum <= #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET state = 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM message WHERE receiver=#{strId} AND del=0 AND state = 1
